channel.title: Qemu, Windows XP guest loses net connectivity to Whonix-Gateway
channel.description:
Hello All. Virtual machine staff - Qemu, Virt-Manager. The Host is Linux, and the guests are: Whonix-Gateway; Windows XP (I use it as Workstation). Everything is working, but the Workstation loses network connection some time after boot. It can be solved by clicking windows repair staff service ([screenshot](http://fast-picture.ru/images/2016/09/9vwxxujhy4oli7fwemmf.png)). But after 5-10 seconds it breaks again, and after 'repairing' again and again... What can be the problem?
ps If I set Windows XP network to "Virtual network 'default': NAT" there is no connection issues.
